name: ReallyGoodBattle
description: ReallyGoodBattle: Fast-Paced, Action-Arcade, Platform-Fighter with an early-Atari inspired minimalistic design. With 2 buttons and a joystick, defeat your foes (or friends) in a simple, yet satisfying way. Run along the walls and approach from all angles to land satisfying, one-hit-kills to win.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 10 MB RAM Storage: 32 MB available space
